known_databases.name: mpe
known_databases.title: Metamath Proof Explorer
known_databases.description: Thousands of theorems of general mathemetics developed on top of first-order classical logic and Zermelo-Fraenkel set theory axioms.

known_databases.name: nf
known_databases.title: New Foundations Explorer
known_databases.description: Quine's heterodox New Foundations theory, where the set of all sets is itself a set.  Recently proved consistent, but has many strange properties.

known_databases.name: hol
known_databases.title: HOL in Metamath
known_databases.description: An embedding of the HOL ("Higher order logic") type theory, used by several other systems, in the Metamath system.

known_databases.name: intuit
known_databases.title: Intuitionistic set theory
known_databases.description: A version of the Metamath Proof Explorer using intuitionistic logic, where X OR Y can only be proven if there is some procedure for determining which one.
